content:
Hello,

I am getting this error when trying to login to our internal Zulip Server (this is Production) and would need your help to troubleshoot:

"Internal server error
This CofiChat server is currently experiencing some technical difficulties. Sorry about that!

The page will reload automatically soon after service is restored."

Ok so I first restarted rabbitmq container and the error persisted, then I restarted the Zulip container and it started working. Zulip service didn't have any errors visible in the output of docker service logs
@jabteles you should be able to find the actual error using the log files recommended here: https://zulip.readthedocs.io/en/latest/production/troubleshooting.html
